description: Uses animation to present elementary facts of human growth and reproduction, and the differences between boys and girls in the rate of maturation. Describes the glands which control physical and sexual activity, the male and female sex organs, menstruation, fertilization, pregnancy and birth. Includes class-room scenes in which a teacher discusses questions which arise following the viewing of animated sequences.
